name: Streamlogics
overview:
Streamlogics, Inc. provides Web presentation and collaboration solutions in North America and Europe. Its products and services include Web casting, Web conferencing, teleconferencing, online training and e-learning, and media hosting.

The company supports various resellers, including conferencing service providers, interactive agencies, investor relations consultants, marketing and PR communications firms, portals or Websites, staging and audio visual production companies, systems integrators, and telecommunications carriers. The company focuses on financial, associations, businesses, technology, government, and healthcare industries. It has research, development, and support facility in Regina, Saskatchewan.

Streamlogics, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada. The company also has regional sales offices in Montreal, Canada; Chicago, Illinois; and Nashville, Tennessee. As of July 6, 2009, Streamlogics, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Thomson Reuters Corporation.

acquisition.source_description: Thomson Reuters Acquires Webcasting Software Firm Streamlogics
